benefits.name: Luck Points
benefits.description: You have a number of Luck Points equal to your Proficiency Bonus and can spend the points on the benefits below. You regain your expended Luck Points when you finish a Long Rest.

benefits.name: Advantage
benefits.description: When you roll a d20 for a D20 Test, you can spend 1 Luck Point to give yourself Advantage on the roll.

benefits.name: Disadvantage
benefits.description: When a creature rolls a d20 for an attack roll against you, you can spend 1 Luck Point to impose Disadvantage on that roll.
